name: Courtyard by Marriott Hotel Bangkok

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed twice at the Courtyard Hotel and I was amazed by the service they provided me. Check-in was smooth and fast. Breakfast was large and tasty! Rooms are very large and very comfortable.
reviews.title: Great Hotel & Great Service

reviews.text: The location also is very convenient with easy access from the airport and close to many attractions and the BTS.
reviews.title: Great Location - Friendly Staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I will definitely recommend this Hotel and for sure I will return to Bangkok and choose the same Hotel.
reviews.title: Always great to come back!

reviews.text: I've traveled to Bangkok on many occasions, unfortunately this time coincided with the Nationwide flooding so I was a little apprehensive with coming or not. I called the hotel almost daily on the build up to my trip so I could stay informed on the developments. Pixxy who works on the front desk was a great help with this, and took most of my calls. Also when I arrived she would give me further updates whenever I passed the front desk.
reviews.title: Comfortable and relaxed
best choice for business
reviews.text: The hotel as a whole was very comfortable and of a quality you wouldnt see in the UK for the prices offered here. The location was also perfect, as it was walking distance to the sky train which was ideal seeing as the amount of taxis on the street seemed a lot less than normal (I'm guessing a lot where effected by the floods).
I was check in since 2/11/11 with my family. Why I choose to stay with courtyard
reviews.title: Courtyard is my second home.

reviews.text: because of I feel this hotel is my second home : hotel location very convinience
reviews.title: First Rate Hotel

reviews.text: service very friendly especialy Momo Cafe staffs, thank you for Khun Pakapol,
reviews.title: Great Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Khun Oak and all room service. Take care my family. Concierge very warm.
reviews.title: courtyard by marriott

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Housekeeping very take care my room everyday.
reviews.title: well located, modern rooms

reviews.text: Overall very pleased with this hotel. Limitation on space, so rooms and facilities (pool) are on the small side. But the room comes with everything an average traveller needs, e.g. bathroom amenities, power outlets that take multinational electric plug-ins, well-stocked bar and comfy beds.
reviews.title: A solid option in central BKK

reviews.text: Something this hotel excels is its customer service in the front desk and concierge departments. They are always eager to help, and do it with a smile. Some transportation tip: always carry the hotel card, and purchase a sim card for cell phone service. Many taxi drivers do not know the hotel location even after they look at the hotel card. So the best bet is to call the hotel operator to explain to the driver of the direction.
reviews.title: Tremendous Value - Will Stay Again!

reviews.text: On the food and beverage front, we tried both their buffet breakfast and lunch at the MoMo cafe (their only full service restaurant). I was not impressed with the buffet breakfast as the selection and quality are only so-so. The Asian style hot dishes are borderline below standard. However, we enjoyed very much of the set lunch and appetizers there. Maybe it's because we had to pay extra for that.
reviews.title: Excellent accommodation!

reviews.text: Location is great. Walking distance to the major shopping district. We never used the Tuk Tuk service as it's cheaper to take a taxi then using the BTS (there were 4 of us).
reviews.title: Great Place. For the price and Marriott brand, this is the one you should chose at Bangkok

reviews.text: By the way, free wifi for all Marriott members. So make sure you apply for it if you haven't got one already.
reviews.title: Its a Courtyard. You get what you pay for...

reviews.text: I have stayed at a lot of Marriott hotels. This particular Marriott puts even some of the top-of-the-line Marriotts to shame. Modern lobby. Exceptionally helpful staff, including a concierge! Free shuttle (tuk tuk) to/from the local shops and Skytrain. Modern, cleverly designed rooms. High-speed Internet (that’s as fast as what I have at home). Very good breakfast with both western and Asian fare.
reviews.title: A Marriott Courtyard, really?

reviews.text: All this at the same cost as what I pay for a Courtyard in North America.
reviews.title: Great Bangkok Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We've just stayed 4 nights and will return again shortly. Located in the high end hotel and shopping district, the 4 seasons just around the corner. It is a smaller scale hotel but has everything you want and does it well. The front desk led by a superb manager "Toto" really make sure all is well. The breakfast buffet fantastic selection and just ask if you want an espresso or capucino. Pool and gym area smallish but hi quality. Rooms slightly smallish but ample with good bedding and flat screen with good channel selection. Bathroom excellent. WIFi very strong. We've stayed in many Bangkok hotels but this one really gets it done.
reviews.title: A refreshing and cosy hotel in the heart of BKK

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is down the road from the 4 face Buddha, around a 3 minute walk. On a small street between Grand Hyatt and the 4 seasons hotels.
reviews.title: Although Known Publicly As Good Class Marriott, But Totally Undeserving Of A Marriott Branding!

reviews.text: **If anyone wants to know, you can take a limo from the airport, its around 1100baht [34USD/275HKD] which includes the highway tolls. If you take a normal cab, its around 500 baht. We always take a limo from the airport because we find them more reliable than cabs and don't try and rip you off - there are 2 counters called ACT limousines outside the arrival at BKK airport.
reviews.title: All in all very Good value for money

description: Courtyard by Marriott Bangkok is centrally located in the heart of Bangkok on Rajdamri Road. Bangkok’s main popular shopping and variety of restaurants are only minutes away. Walking distance to BTS Sky-train Rajdamri Station.35 km or 45 minutes by car from Suvarnabhumi International Airport to the hotel.
